basics.name: Arturo Jain
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary: I devoted my life to media, content creation, and community management using low-budget technologies, achieving and exceeding my established — and own — goals. My experience has grown overtime by working in several projects gaining knowledge in design, marketing, photography, and my bachelor as an IT and systems engineer.

work.summary: Development of web platforms, design of digital communication and IT administration.

Creation of the web platforms Innova-T, platform to promote the innovation in the employees with the creation and generation of ideas and projects using a voting (liking) system to promote the best ideas or projects, and GIS, web app to book meeting rooms and invite guests to the meeting, support of the Innovation area as UX designer.
highlights: Development of both the Innova-T platform and the GIS platform. Both were platforms that had not been developed for over two years prior to my arrival and were deployed and developed in record time. The GIS app is an app that reduces cost to the company due to the lack of need of people to book meeting rooms, previously done by the Service Desk.
Web development using Java Web, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and MySQL. UX design, designing the UI for GIS, Innova-T, Localiza-T and more.

Video production, live video stream production, event production, community management, technolo- gies consultancy and expertise.
